title: Bug 10022: Incorrect 'Build' popup action enablement
OB: The 'Build' popup action is enabled even when a manual build is not required.
EB: The 'Build' popup action should only be enabled if a manual build is required.
SR:
1. Launch the software.
2. Navigate to the 'Build' popup action.
3. Verify if the action is enabled when a manual build is not needed.
